import Identicon from 'react-identicons' import heroimg from '../assets/hero.jpg' import { setGlobalState, useGlobalState, truncate } from '../store' const Hero = () => { const [connectedAccount] = useGlobalState('connectedAccount') const onCreatedNFT = () => { setGlobalState('modal', 'scale-100') } return (
